revised_title: Conflict Mediation and the Evolution of Organism Individuality
tldr: The author explores the concept of conflict mediation and cooperation in the evolution of organism individuality. They discuss how organisms regulate internal conflicts among cells and promote cooperation to maintain their integrity and individuality. The author also examines the role of the germ line in regulating selfish tendencies of cells and reducing the mutation rate, which is crucial for the emergence of complex organisms.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
